nodes.bodyText:
I know that it isn't scope of this task, but can we replace
scopeTbls.get(rnd.nextInt(scopeTbls.size())))
with
pickRndItem(scopeTbls)
here to improve code readability?
Should we have some documentation about what filters can be generated with this tools? Because now it's become not obvious what conditions can be generated by this tool.
What kind of documentation do you mean?
Maybe just javadoc with all types of queries or some other logic description. For example - why we must generate some special conditions for subquery?
